data.title: 63 Video Game Characters Trivia Quizzes
data.meta_description: The best quizzes in this category as voted by visitors.
data.text:
FREE! Click here to Join FunTrivia. Thousands of games, quizzes, and lots more!

Video Game Villains

What do you find appealing about video games? Is it the action? The graphics? Maybe it's getting to play the hero? Or perhaps the challenge or the difficulty? For this quiz, let us consider the abhorrent villains that one must overcome.
